title: “Infertility in an adult cohort with primary ciliary dyskinesia: phenotype–gene association.” Gert Jan Vanaken, Laurence Bassinet, Mieke Boon, Rahma Mani, Isabelle Honoré, Jean-Francois Papon, Harry Cuppens, Martine Jaspers, Natalie Lorent, André Coste, Estelle Escudier, Serge Amselem, Bernard Maitre, Marie Legendre and Sophie Christin-Maitre. Eur Respir J 2017; 50: 1700314.
